players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I am the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. Keep an eye on Alice, she seems suspicious."
Charlie: "I don't think Bob is the mafioso, he just confessed. I think Alice might be."
